name: lookup-service-ui
description: Quickly check tokens & badges of addresses.
author: Ethcore Team <admin@ethcore.io>

scripts.bundle: browserify -g [ babelify --presets es2015 ] -t envify index.js > bundle.js
scripts.build: npm run bundle && npm run minify
scripts.start: watchify -g [ babelify --presets es2015 ] -t envify index.js -o bundle.js
scripts.prepush: npm run lint && npm run build
